name: skin_material_type
description: Most imported objects will get a plain material with a combination of diffuse and normal maps. For skin you can opt to use an enhanced material which will add support for pores, color correction and so forth
label: Skin material type
items: Add a more elaborate skin with support for pores and color correction
Add the elaborate skin, and also add support for sub surface scattering
Do not create an elaborate skin. Instead use the default material approach
